_header: Thou wost well little who is thy foe
Subjects: chansons d’aventure ; birds, as narrators; advice, moral
_description: A chanson d’aventure — song of moral advice spoken by a bird — in quatrains (abab) with refrain, ‘Þou wost wol lytil ho is thi foo’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Þou wost wol lytil is þi foo…Man like þou
                    haue this gysQuatsumeuere þou xalt doo…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Of thi speche the wil avysÞou wost wol lytil ho is thin
                    foo
BLSl2593.Note:
Incomplete, beginning last line of a stanza, followed by 5
                    stanzas.
